mainText:
Steven Jobs I never met you before but I feel I have in a life before 
this one. Your thoughts and ideas have inspired me so much! you were an 
absolutely amazing man and will be remember for years to come for your 
hard work, ability to see the future, and dedication for Apple. You have 
put Apple at astronomical levels, Apple is far more than what it used to 
be. I will tell my children about you and the inspiration you have given 
to me, and i just hope one day I'm successful as you were. Steve may 
your body and soul now rest in peace and be free.
author: Douglas
